content:
I'd be happy to help you manage your schedule.

To account for the extra 30 minutes, you can block out a 1.5-hour window for each meeting. Here's a suggestion:

* Schedule your online meetings on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 2:00 PM to 3:30 PM.

This way, you'll have the actual meeting time from 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM (assuming they usually last 30 minutes longer than expected), and then an additional 30 minutes of buffer time from 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM to account for any overruns or wrap-up time.

By blocking out this 1.5-hour window, you'll ensure that you have enough time for the meeting and some extra time to spare, without overcommitting yourself or feeling rushed.

Does this sound like a good plan to you?
